Data with D.content: Developed and optimized deep learning models using PyTorch, TensorFlow, and OpenCV, with a focus on producing high-quality generative outputs. Specialized in fine-tuning large language models (LLMs) such as OpenAI and OLama for tailored performance. Leveraged Docker for streamlined containerization and deployment, and utilized FFmpeg for multimedia processing along with colmap for 3D reconstruction. Also proficient in managing cloud infrastructure, optimizing resources on AWS (S3, EC2) to support scalable solutions.

GDSC AI/ML.content: As the AI/ML Lead for the Google Developer Student Club, I drive initiatives to build a collaborative environment where students can explore, learn, and implement AI and machine learning concepts. I conduct workshops, organize study jams, and lead hands-on projects to help members develop foundational skills in machine learning and artificial intelligence. By fostering an inclusive and innovative community, I aim to bridge the gap between theoretical knowledge and practical application in AI/ML for students at all skill levels.
